name: Barrel Roll (SinexProgs)
description:
Barell Roll

As any shady profitable buisness, Prowler's Paradise Casino is filled with dirty secrets. Secrets a lot of people want to exploit. From cops to its own customers. But you're not just an onlooker desperate for cash or a police dog sniffin' casino's owners out in false hopes of finally putting 'em in jail. You're Tony and this here casino is your chance into the big league. Don't come back until you find whatever it is keeping it afloat. Be warned though, somethin' fishy is going on there. We sent 3 guys before ya and non of 'em came back.

A really short platformer shooter made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

AD - Move

Space - Jump

LMB - Shoot/Reload (No Ammo)

R - Reload

AD - Move

Space - Jump

LMB - Shoot/Reload (No Ammo)

R - Reload

MGilbas: Visuals, design, sounds

SinexProgs: Programming, sounds

Special thanks to justexd for the featured artwork

A short platformer shooter that initially was supposed to come out as a submission to GMTK Game Jam 2022. Wasn't due to technical difficulties.
